minecraft:crafting_table.description: Makes this block a crafting table

minecraft:unit_cube.description: Specifies that a unit cube is to be used with tessellation

minecraft:material_instances.description: Maps face or material_instance names in a geometry file to an actual material instance. Material instance can either be a full material instance or a name to another already defined instance

texture.description: Name of a texture from the terrain_texture.json file

render_method.description: Method to use for rendering this face

minecraft:geometry.description: The geometry definition name to use

minecraft:on_step_on.description: Trigger an event when a player steps onto this block

minecraft:on_step_off.description: Trigger an event when a player leaves this block

minecraft:on_player_destroyed.description: Trigger an event when a player destroys this block

minecraft:on_fall_on.description: Trigger an event when a player falls onto this block

minecraft:on_placed.description: Trigger an event when this block is placed

minecraft:on_player_placing.description: Trigger an event when a player places this block

minecraft:on_interact.description: Trigger an event when this block is interacted with

minecraft:ticking.description: Trigger an event at a regular interval between two values

range.description: Range between which the component will trigger its event

minecraft:random_ticking.description: Triggers an event at random intervals

minecraft:breakonpush.description: When pushed by a piston the block breaks

minecraft:immovable.description: An Immovable block cannot be pushed by pistons

minecraft:breathability.description: Property describing the breathability of this block and whether it is treated as a solid or as air

minecraft:onlypistonpush.description: Blocks with those components won't stick to stickyPistons

minecraft:placement_filter.description: Sets rules for under what conditions the block can be placed/survive

block_filter.description: List of blocks (can use tags to specify them) that this block can be placed against in the allowed_faces direction

allowed_faces.description: Defines the block faces this block can be placed on, e.g 'down' means you can only place this block on th bottom face of the block. If the block it is placed on is removed, this block will be destroyed

minecraft:preventsjumping.description: This component makes it so actors can't jump when walking on this block

minecraft:rotation.description: This is the block's rotation around the center of the cube in degrees. The rotation order is x-y-z

minecraft:unwalkable.description: This component sets a block as unwalkable. Most mobs will not try to jump over it if the value is set to true

minecraft:display_name.description: Specifies the display name id for the block
